manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: High Potency Classics Face Finishing & Firming Moisturizer This indulgent, rose-scented moisturizer combines Perricone MD’s signature sciences with a nourishing, rich and ultra-hydrating texture. Delivers instant hydration, while visibly smoothing, plumping and firming skin’s appearance over time, leaving a radiant complexion. Infuses the skin with essential hydration to help minimize the look of lines and wrinkles.Enriched with antioxidants and nutrients for a smoother appearance.Imparts an instantly glowing, dewy complexion.

Short Description Indulgent, rose-scented moisturizer to deeply moisturize and treat for a luminous-looking complexion. Skin Concerns Dullness - Dry Skin - Loss of Radiance - Fine Lines & Wrinkles Texture Lotion Scent Rose Featured Ingredients DMAE - Vitamin E - Kukui Nut Seed Oil Application Massage onto cleansed face and neck using a gentle upward motion. Use mornings and evenings. For best results, apply after your favorite Perricone MD serum, serum concentrate or facial cream. SPF No Size 0.5 fl. oz. | 2 fl. oz. | 4 fl. oz.

Hyaluronic Intensive Moisturizer Face Finishing & Firming Moisturizer Face Finishing & Firming Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Finishing & Firming Tinted Moisturizer Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Retinol Recovery Overnight Moisturizer Hyaluronic Intensive Hydrating Mask Product Description A gel-cream moisturizer to deliver intense hydration for plumper, healthier-looking skin. Indulgent, rose-scented moisturizer to deeply moisturize and treat for a luminous-looking complexion. Protects and deeply moisturizes for a radiant-looking complexion. A lightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer to deliver all-day hydration with a hint of luminous tint. Skin looks tightened and plumped. Works overnight to intensely nourish for a firmer, smoother, healthier-looking complexion. Instantly nourishes and hydrates for a visibly plump and smooth complexion.

Growth Factor Firming & Lifting Eye Serum Growth Factor Firming & Lifting Serum Hyaluronic Intensive Hydrating Serum Face Finishing & Firming Toner Hyaluronic Intensive Body Therapy Classics Nutritive Cleanser Product Description Instantly nourishes and hydrates for a visibly plump and smooth complexion. Instantly nourishes and hydrates for a visibly plump and smooth complexion. Immediate & deep hydration for a visibly plump & smooth complexion Instantly revitalizes & visibly tightens pores for a firmer, even-looking complexion Immediate and intense hydration for visibly firm and smooth skin. Gentle gel cleanser to soften, condition and prepare skin for treatment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this moisturizer. The texture is wonderful - creamy and light. The scent is a light rosewater, which could almost be lavender. This moisturizer makes my face soft and plumps my skin. I would use in on my whole body if I could afford it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cant go without this!
reviews.reviewText: Love that this does it all! A little warmth to the skin, min tightening, spf and moisturizer all in one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have not been able to find a good moisturizer. I have been eyeing this brand/moisturizer for a while and decided to try it. It goes on nice without feeling greasy. I have oily skin and this moisturizer works perfectly with my oily skin. I already bought the bigger bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I liked the consistency of the product. It is smooth looking. I hope as l use it l will be satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2011
reviews.reviewText: Okay this stuff is awesome. I dont have wrinkles, but I am doing preventative stuff... as a girl now-a-days in her MID 20's this is a good thing to do. I would definitely recommend it to anyone, any age, gender, skin color, skin type, etc....Perricone md makes my skin feel like silk and has decreased redness.. also firmed a little around the cheeks/jaw and eyes, and most noticeable for me(over past 4 weeks) diminished acne scaring and acne breakouts. My face doesn't have dry patches with an oily T zone anymore. It's just normal, healthy soft skin... and its basically WINTER in Pennsylvania right now! I would normally be as dry as a burnt piece of toast. I have only a few TINY fine lines nothing that would make me look a day over 25 haha. Anyways, the smell is possibly a turn off to some.... I dont like the smell of rose scented creams, it reminds me of working at the nursing home. BUT I like this cream a lot. I'm fair skinned, with some old acne scaring, hyper-pigmentation, oily/dry skin, occasional acne..from my Mirena IUD (made me get acne all over my body. And ive never had acne except during puberty. But as my skin md advised it is actually going away slowly after about 6 months of freaking out...) The smell is not a problem for me anyhow... I dont even notice it after like 30 minutes... my boyfriend likes the smell haha. I dont hate it. Another thing i like it how when you put it on after a nice session of microderm scrubbin' it makes your face feel super fresh and tingly, like you dipped your face in ice water with eucalyptus or mint leaf... idk... it feels good and I know its making my pores WAY SMALLER when i feel that :-). which was the real selling factor for me. I say buy it... try it, worth a shot. If you cant afford it on here... buy it off HSN and do the easy value pays... or whichever tv channel its on. I love VALUE PAY haha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For people with normal skin this is probably amazing
reviews.reviewText: Updating my initial review. My face is having some reaction to the rose scent. Other than that it’s very moisturizing, but will have to return unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this and will never switch. The scent is amazing and it feels so smooth and soft

Die Creme von Dr. Perricone ist sehr schön. Ich benutze sie schon seit Jahren, sie spendet der Haut viel Feuchtigkeit und ist super verträglich.Der Preis bei Amazon ist super, ich habe immer wesentlich mehr bezahlt. Danke dafür.

Espero Amazon me pueda ayudar con este producto que pedí y que tuvo problemas de envío y tuve que devolverlo, el proveedor me parece que ya recibió de vuelta el producto pero la devolución de mi dinero no me ha llegado. qué puedo hacer? Desde Marzo no se me ha resuelto el problema. Espero y Amazon pueda resolverlo porque es la imagen de esta plataforma la que se daña.
This is my go-to rose-petal soft and perfect moisturizer.
